page.title: 02AKEMAN STREET FARM
page.content: Akeman street farm has got 770 acres of land. 500 To Wheat and Barley. 50 To hay for racehorses. 30 To oil seed rape. 100 To potatoes. 50 To sugar beet. The farm also has a 9 million gallon resevoir and some grassland. The farmer works to two seperate six year rotations to ensure healthy crops. On the farm they grow sugar beet, when it's grown it's taken to a factory in Kidderminster and made into Silver spoon sugar.They also grow Maris Piper potatoes under the name of Combe selected potatoes. Mr.M.Green owns the farm but he has to pay rent to the Duke of Marlborough each year for the farm. We saw a truck come in for wheat. In recent years Akeman Street Farm has tken over the other farms in the area.
